title: T205 Broadleaf Huggins for trade (or sale)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: T205 Broadleaf Huggins for trade (or sale)
posts.post_content:
Edit 10/29/15:
I've decided that I may sell this card.  The problem is its hard to find any comparable sales to use as a judge of value.  I'm going to list it will a high price OBO and seif I can get some idea of the value.  Basically, I just want to find a fair price for it.  But if it ends up being worth like $300 - $400 then I would just keep it because its worth more to me than that.

If any t205 experts see this and want to send me a PM with some price advice, I would appreciate it.  Hopefully I can figure this out quickly.

Price: $750 obo

I'm considering trading my BL Huggins.  I'm only looking for a few specific cards from the T206 set.  I'm not interested in selling it.  I can add cash or other cards to make a deal work if necessary. 



Looking to knock one of these bigger cards off my 150-350 want list.  Looking for Good or better with nice eye appeal:

Bender portrait Old Mill
Crawford throwing Old Mill
Elberfeld Wash (Old Mill)
Evers blue sky (non Pied/SC/Sov350)
Keeler bat Old Mill
Lajoie port (non Pied/SC/Sov350)
Matty white cap (non Pied/SC/Sov350)
Matty port (non Pied/SC/Sov350)
Tinker port (non Pied/SC/Sov350)
Tinker hands on knees (Hindu, Old Mill)
WaJo port (non Pied/SC/Sov350)
Young bare hand with one of these backs (Old Mill, EPDG, Sov150)

Awesome Huggins card Luke!  Good luck on your quest!

Scott
I've decided to put a price on it.  I could be way off, and if I am please shoot me a PM and set me straight.

If it's only worth $200 I'll close the thread and apologize for wasting everyone's time.  

This common went for $235 recently.  My card is much nicer and one of the few HOFers that were printed with a BL back.  Seems that mine should be worth significantly more.

[url]http://loveofthegameauctions.com/lot-4869.aspx[/url]
I would say maybe $300-350. Admittedly, the front looks very nice but the paper loss/chunk out of the back is not really attractive...
